author: flipdazed
content:
Hi all - recently quit my job in TradFi quant trading to delve head first into blockchain development (mainly doing cryptography in `brownie` right now)

Currently, focused on ZK user attestations for permissioned trading at Keyring.Network - here to make sure we're in line with EF goals and community and leverage some of the EF tech stack. Been enjoying hanging out with various people in PSE until now mainly IRL but finally dipping into the discord
... Alex
